data.title: News and features about American idol - Page 4
data.meta_description: The latest about American Idol - breaking news, comments and features from CinemaBlend.
data.text:
Carson Daly Admits He ‘Hated American Idol’ And It Had A Big Effect On His Initial Reaction When He Got Offered The Voice

Carson Daly admitted that he "hated American Idol," and how that affected his reaction to being offered The Voice hosting job.

The Most Popular TV Show Every Year Since 1970

From a time when people still "tuned in," to the streaming era, these are the most popular TV shows since 1970 by ratings average.

After Whoopi Goldberg Called American Idol Out For 'Destroying Civilization,' Insider Reveals How Katy Perry And Other Judges Are Feeling

Katy Perry, Luke Bryan and Lionel Richie allegedly have thoughts about Whoopi Goldberg's comment that American Idol was "the downfall of society."

American Idol’s Season 21 Runner-Up Has Now Weighed In On Whether Or Not The Show’s Season Finale Win Was ‘Rigged'

Megan Danielle gave her thoughts on whether or not American Idol "rigged" the season for Iam Tongi.

American Idol Winner Claps Back Over Claims He Only Won After The Show Was 'Rigged'

American Idol Season 21 winner Iam Tongi responds after some claim he only won due to the show being "rigged."

Whoopi Goldberg Makes Bold Claim About American Idol Allegedly Leading To 'Downfall Of American Society’ On The View

In a recent episode of The View, host Whoopi Goldberg had some choice words for series American Idol, leading to a deeper conversation.

There’s An Alternate Universe Where Ryan Seacrest Didn’t Host American Idol (And It Has Nothing To Do With Brian Dunkleman)

Ryan Seacrest recently admitted he almost didn't host American Idol, and it has nothing to do with his first season co-host Brian Dunkleman.

Ryan Seacrest Has Already Left New York And Is ‘Reunited’ With His ‘California Chickens’ After Exiting Live!

Ryan Seacrest wasted no time getting out of New York following his final episode of Live with Kelly and Ryan, reuniting with his L.A. chickens.

Kim Kardashian Has A Notable Ugly-Cry Face, So Of Course She Bonded With Katy Perry Over Hers

Kim Kardashian is known for her ugly-cry face, and she had an epic response when American Idol's Katy Perry shared her own.
